entities.name: dementor
entities.description: A dark creature that is haunting Harry. It is described as having halted and being between Harry and the Patronus.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A silvery shadow that comes out of Harry's wand to protect him from the dementor. It is described as being cloudy and vanishing along with the dementor.

entities.name: boggart
entities.description: A creature that Professor Lupin forces back into a packing case using his wand. It turns into a silvery orb again.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is described as forcing the boggart back into the packing case and praising Harry's effort.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being on his feet despite feeling exhausted, and receiving praise from Professor Lupin for his effort in casting a Patronus.

relationships.description: Harry is protected by the Patronus, which comes out of his wand to defend him from the dementor.
Professor Lupin defeats the boggart by forcing it back into a packing case using his wand.
